text: End of a long day - but I'm missing something obvious here. I've followed <https://designers.HubSpot.com/tutorials/getting-started-with-modules> and pasted the module code in to the template as explained in step 13. But all I get is a missing block in home.html - see screenshots. <@U7SL518D6> am I missing something obvious? Step 13 says replace the module, I just commented it out (I think I've done that correctly) and pasted in the code in Step 13. The module itself previews find in Design Manager.
I have various Dynamic pages that I'm wanting to move into a new theme. Is this going to cause a problem?

Hey Jon it shouldn't be depending on how you're going about it. The problem Derek is running into is between using a template leveraging DND areas vs. a regular HTML template (with HubDB values inserted where needed). You should be able to use HTML templates without DND areas in a theme.
